name: Scott the Woz: The Game
description:
Welcome to STW:TG! The kind-of sorta action-esque platformer created in GDevelop 5.0. It's been in the making for 5 months, and will recieve an update at least once a month! Have fun with it, will ya? Now featuring the Minus World and sever "speedrun codes"! The game is already short, but here's some of them:

1. Press D + B + G on the title screen to go directly to Credits for - world

2. Press LShift + Return or Enter in Level 1-6 to skip it

3. Press SPACE to skip credits

4. Press 0 + 1 on the Minus World death screen to skip to -6.

5. Press LSHIFT + Enter on -1 to skip to -2.

Changelog:

-Edited graphics for spinning platforms in -3, made Dick Vitale visible in -2, and made 1-3 more detailed

-Added room after credits for world -
